html:
7.31.21  7:25 pm   a few years ago i saw someone ask if there were any questions you hoped would be asked. have any such questions been asked since then?

      yes. i always wish for people to ask the actual questions that they ask. so, in that sense, it happens every time

7.31.21  7:17 pm   Hey Bill, I would like to learn a new key.  The only key I know is Db/C#. Any other keys you think I should learn first? Any tips on how to become motivated to learn new keys?

      if you want to do it, then you're already motivated to do it. if you don't want to, then you don't have to. if you do want to, you can. so it's a win-win there. to decide on a next key to learn, i'd suggest finding the song you are most familiar with that is not in Db. and learn that song, it its original key

7.31.21  7:01 pm   Would you ever make a concept album?

      in my personal experience, i don't find albums to be particularly good concept holsters

7.31.21  6:47 pm   do you eat your crackers with or without the shell

      without the shell, also without the cracker

7.31.21  6:27 pm   What kind of rut were you stuck in when you made "i'm stuck in a rut?"

      had sufficient musical ability on multiple instruments for almost any professional playing situation, and yet, i couldn't seem to think of any viable procedure to go about composing and producing my own original songs

7.31.21  6:05 pm   do you like being alive?

      yes but it's confusing

7.31.21  5:49 pm   what are stop signs

      an iconic piece of our culture

7.31.21  5:09 pm   how to shop for groceries

      you have to think like a grocery

7.31.21  4:27 pm   I know you like to try and catch all your ideas. I used to too. At work in the amazon warehouse many ideas came to me. and I would run around like a crazy person trying to find a pen and paper to write them down. then at home after a while I ended up having a stack of these ideas. then two stacks and three. then I went for yoga teacher training and learned about aparigraha and wanted to become detached and the feeling I get when an idea comes feels very attached so I wanted to get rid of my stacks of ideas. so I got rid of most of them and kept a few. But now I'm thinking, why do I need to capture every idea? because I'm not the source of them. The source is endless! and if the source wanted me to have an idea at a certain point in time, it would send one, right? so maybe that's how I can remain detached while also being open to receiving ideas. But then again I have nothing to show for any of this yet, while you have much to show for your methods of capturi ng all possible ideas. So maybe I shouldn't have gotten rid of my stacks of ideas. Oh well. The past is the past.

      you're right that there are infinite. but the reason i think you need to write them down is because they mostly probably will not come to you at your moment of deliberate songwriting. When you go to work on songwriting, on purpose, and you need ideas, ..... the ideas might not want to come, because they feel they are being watched. Ideas seem to come more readily when you are not expecting. that's why i think it's important to write these down, because this might be your main best source of ideas. Then, the songwriting department just has to learn how to work with ideas that are handed to them, from the list. then there's whole other department called the selecting department, but that's another story entirely

7.31.21  1:23 pm   What's a thing I can explore?

      the world

7.31.21  1:10 pm   how do I be like you

      take it a step further, be like how you wish i was

7.31.21  12:08 pm   i don't know if you'll be able to answer this, since you seem like a very forgiving and friendly person. but how do i cope with hating someone so goddamn much????

      think of what it's like to be them

7.31.21  11:48 am   how to stop wanting things?

      that's easy, just get all the things

7.31.21  11:11 am   why in scary pictures the monsters are always smiling?

      because sad monsters are simply not scary

7.31.21  10:16 am   if there's a new work, where's old york?

      north eastern England

7.31.21  7:20 am   bill, its not healthy to stay up late. please go to sleep

      does this advice still apply if it is currently very early

7.31.21  5:49 am   Y do u write billwurtz.com as billwurtz dot com on billwurtz.com?

      that's to avoid causing the viewer's device to get carried away when displaying it. which you may have just caused, for some people

7.31.21  4:48 am   How to stop second guessing if youre doing the right thing

      you might need to get some sort of cheat sheet, which has the right answers

7.31.21  4:35 am   how do you decide which videos to include yourself in?

      i have to guess, but i usually get it right

7.31.21  4:07 am   Hey, bill. So, I wrote this little 4 bar thing in D major which starts on F# and ends on D, but there came a point where the only good note to put next was a G# in it, which makes me think it could actually be A major. It's also is in 5/4 but I was half thinking in 4/4 and 3/4 when I wrote it, so now it's just this mess that doesn't properly fit into a key or time signature, which is making it very difficult to continue on it. Any advice on how to continue with this even though it's a mess? Thanks bill, appreciate it

      approximately 25% of all songs in D major have a G# note in them somewhere. also about 25% of all songs have time signature changes in there somewhere, often for just 1 bar and then back to normal

7.31.21  2:46 am   how do you come up with your lyrics?

      musically

7.31.21  2:12 am   can i make it?

      make what? nevermind, yes

7.31.21  1:30 am   Hi Bill, I discovered something here and I'm curious what it is. On the reality page, if I click directly to the right of a date, I see more numbers highlighted that I didn't see before. Like an example would be "e4.16.16"
What are they? What do they mean?

      those are the date when it was edited, and the date when it was posted

7.31.21  1:24 am   what is it like to have a toaster?

      i have no earthly idea

7.31.21  12:35 am   is god real?

      are you

7.30.21  11:38 pm   what's something i can do to utilize my dreams as best as possible

      how about stating your own tv show

7.30.21  11:25 pm   Bill, I really want to create a song using guitars and drums being played in a similar way to my favorite artists, but that requires years of practice and dedication. I've played piano for my whole life, so I know how hard that is.

However, I feel like I'm not in a position to postpone songmaking until I master all of these elements since I want to release something relatively soon.

I could make a song using the skills that I have, but I feel like it won't be as good as it could be if I mastered those instruments. I would prefer to do things by myself since I don't want to compromise creatively. What should I do

      see if you can get a percussion instrument that you can tap with your foot

7.30.21  9:49 pm   what is a brain?

      it's like 10,000 brains, condensed into one

7.30.21  9:23 pm   What's your favorite street sign? (stop, yield, one way, etc) 

      start

7.30.21  8:00 pm   why do you decide to answer this many questions?

      it's my attempt to explain myself

7.30.21  7:51 pm   what's a good symbol that's not part of any current widely-used writing system? 

      ⌘

7.30.21  3:41 pm   When we will be able to enjoy your next hit song?

      as soon as i can figure out how to stop getting in the way of myself

      which funky music

7.30.21  1:24 pm   Why don't you link redirect any asked questions that already have been answered to the page where it has?

      because the answer to some questions change over time. such as what is the soup of the day

7.30.21  12:50 pm   how do you manage to keep going?

      i've barely even started

7.30.21  12:36 pm   advice on actually executing your ideas and not just leaving them in your head? 

      you probably need to set up some hard limits, for the parameters of the production process. ideas can be infinite. this makes them somewhat impossible to put into the real world in their full form. i'm sorry about this

7.30.21  12:15 pm   Why do people think that you don't use capital letters? also have a nice day 

      they may have selective vision where any time i use a capital letter they can't see it
